short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically deletes cookies when tabs are closed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Auto Cookie Deleter: Clean Your Cookies Automatically with Ease!

Take control of your online privacy with Auto Cookie Deleter. This extension automatically deletes cookies as soon as you close a tab, ensuring that no unwanted data lingers from your browsing sessions. Whether you're concerned about tracking, want to free up space, or just like a cleaner browsing experience, Auto Cookie Deleter has you covered.

Features:
1) Whitelist Specific Domains: Keep cookies for trusted websites by adding them to your whitelist.
2) Active Mode: Enable this mode to automatically monitor and delete cookies without any manual intervention.
3) Flexible Cookie Cleanup: Choose between deleting all cookies, ignoring cookies from open tabs, or selectively clearing cookies for the current domain.
4) Simple and Intuitive UI: Manage your whitelist and settings in a clean, user-friendly interface.
5) Total Cookie Tracking: See how many cookies have been deleted at any time.

With Auto Cookie Deleter, you get the power of automated cookie management and privacy protection at your fingertips. 

Perfect for users who value simplicity and security.
